service-1-desc: Building Android and iOS apps with an attractive design and agile performance. From development to publication in the stores.
service-2-desc: Building modern web systems with secure backends and dynamic interfaces, guaranteeing performance and scalability.
project-1-desc: Study assistant integrated into OpenAI's generative AI
project-2-desc: High school capstone project with technician - Platform developed to facilitate the entry of social minorities into the technology market as freelancers. This project won 3rd place in the Academic Hackathon at ETEC Abdias do Nascimento and was a semi-finalist in the Desafio Liga Jovem, competing against more than 600 groups.
project-3-desc: Mobile application that simulates the experience of a coffee shop, allowing users to explore coffee options, view details and personalize their choices in a modern and intuitive interface.
description: Creative software engineer with more than +3 years of experience in enterprise companies and startups. Proficient in Flutter, Android Kotlin and Express.js. Passionate about UI/UX.

Questione.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Responsible for the development of Morf, a study assistant integrated with OpenAI's generative AI, using Flutter.
Technologies used: Bloc, WebSocket, Firebase Auth, Storage, Firestore, Remote Config, Analytics, Codemagic CI/CD.
App available on the Play Store and App Store, with a user base of over 1,300 active users.
Developed a CRM with frontend using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and backend in Node.js with Express, including JWT-based authentication.

CI&T.title: Android Developer
responsibilities: Developed features in a modularized application using MVVM architecture with Kotlin.
Utilized GitHub CI/CD for continuous integration and delivery.

Dextra.title: Android Developer
responsibilities: Participated in a challenge using Flutter Web.
Started a development track in Android using Kotlin.
